repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.unittitle: James Connolly Irish Republican Club Records
did.abstract: The collection documents the activism of the Albany-based James Connolly Irish Republican Club during the mid-late 1970s through the Club's revival in 2015.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: Founded in the early 1970s, the James Connolly Irish Republican Club operated in the Albany area and supported the Official Irish Republican Movement in Ireland. It also engaged in other issues of the period such as women's rights, desegregation, and human rights.
In 2015, Anne Hess Neville and Martin K. Manley, active members since the mid-1970s revived the Club.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection includes photographs, correspondence, flyers, and other event materials. Please note that the materials from the 1970s and 1980s are facsmilie reproductions.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: James Connolly Irish Republican Club members Anne Hess Neville and Martin K. Manley donated the collection to the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives in 2015.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. Portions of the collection may contain recent administrative records and/or personally identifiable information. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, James Connolly Irish Republican Club Records, 1972-2015. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the James Connolly Irish Republican Club Records).
